languages.text: "Ирлиэт, тебе стоило поговорить об этом со мной! Я думал{mf||a}, между нами особая связь".

traits.locale_text: "Ирлиэт, тебе стоило поговорить об этом со мной! Я думал, между нами особая связь".

languages.text: "Yrliet, you should have spoken to me about this! I thought we had a special bond."
languages.original_text: "Ирлиэт, тебе стоило поговорить об этом со мной! Я думал{mf||a}, между нами особая связь".

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet, you should have talked this over with me! I thought there was a special bond between us."
"Yrliet, you should have talked this over with me! I thought there was a special bond between us."
"Yrliet, you should have talked this over with me! I thought there was a special bond between us."
"Yrliet, you should have talked this over with me! I thought there was a special bond between us."
"Yrliet, you should have spoken to me about this! I thought we had a special bond."
"Yrliet, you should have spoken to me about this! I thought we had a special bond."

languages.text: « Yrliet, vous auriez dû m'en parler ! Je croyais que notre relation était spéciale. »
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, you should have spoken to me about this! I thought we had a special bond."

traits.locale_text: « Yrliet, vous auriez dû m'en parler ! Je croyais que notre relation était spéciale. »

languages.text: “伊莉耶特，你本该把这些话告诉我才对！我本以为我们之间有着特别的关系。”
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, you should have spoken to me about this! I thought we had a special bond."

traits.locale_text: “伊莉耶特，你本该把这些话告诉我才对！我本以为我们之间有着特别的关系。”

languages.text: 「ユリエット、このことは私に話すべきだった！私達は、特別な絆で結ばれていると思っていたのに」
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, you should have spoken to me about this! I thought we had a special bond."

traits.locale_text: 「ユリエット、このことは私に話すべきだった！私達は、特別な絆で結ばれていると思っていたのに」

languages.text: "Yrliet, darüber hättet Ihr mir mir sprechen sollen! Ich dachte, wir haben eine besondere Verbindung."
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, you should have spoken to me about this! I thought we had a special bond."

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet, Ihr hättet das mit mir besprechen sollen! Ich dachte wirklich, wir hätten eine besondere Verbindung."

languages.text: «Yrliet, ¡deberías haberme hablado de esto! Creía que tenímos un vínculo especial».
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, you should have spoken to me about this! I thought we had a special bond."

traits.locale_text: «Yrliet, ¡deberías haberme hablado de esto! Creía que tenímos un vínculo especial».

languages.text: "Yrliet, bu konuda benimle konuşman gerekirdi! Aramızda özel bir bağ olduğunu düşünmüştüm."
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, you should have spoken to me about this! I thought we had a special bond."

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet, bu konuda benimle konuşman gerekirdi! Aramızda özel bir bağ olduğunu düşünmüştüm."
